DOC.brief_summary: The aim smartphone-based intervention study determine whether newly develop app effective promote active lifestyle low educate work young adult .
DOC.brief_title: A Smartphone-based Intervention Promote Active Lifestyle Low Educated Working Young Adults
DOC.detailed_description: A stepwise approach use develop new native Android smartphone app ( Active Coach ) . This app aim promote active lifestyle ( physical activity active transport ) low educate work young adult . The development app base theory , evidence user 's experience . The app focus four determinant ( knowledge , attitude ( perceived benefit perceive barrier ) , social support self-efficacy ) include several behavioral change technique ( self-monitoring , goal-setting , feedback behavior , review behavior goal , instruction perform behavior , information health consequence , enhance network linkage prompts/cues ) . Furthermore , app work combination wearable activity tracker ( Fitbit Charge ) track user activity behavior . For smartphone-based intervention , 120 low educate work young adult recruit via purposeful convenience sample though company employer . Participants medical condition prevent physically active need Android smartphone . Fitbit Charge activity tracker provide . The participant randomly divide intervention group standard information control group . The intervention period nine week . At begin end intervention period , physical activity level objectively measure accelerometer . Follow-up measurement conduct 12 week end intervention period .
DOC.criteria: 18 28 year old low educate ( maximum secondary school , high education ( university college ) employ dutch speaking own Android smartphone physically active ( already reach recommend 30 minute physical activity day )
